cluster_relations.rel_desc: Businesses are the organizations whose brands are being presented.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Links a business or organization to a brand that it owns or that represents it in the market.
remarks: Generic ownership relation used to bind business to its brand.
Generic ownership relation used to bind business to its brand.
Generic ownership relation used to bind business to its brand.

The current canonical_rel_name 'has_brand' and rel_cls_group 'OWNERSHIP' treat the link primarily as an ownership relation, but the upstream hints ('owns_or_represented_by') also include a representational/identity aspect (a brand representing a business in the market). This dual semantics (ownership + representation) seems acceptable for now but may warrant future review if more fine-grained predicates (e.g., 'owns_brand' vs. 'is_represented_by_brand') are introduced.
Generic ownership relation used to bind business to its brand.
